title: description
Lean belgian-style tripel: An estranged half-removed god-daughter to themunchner-style helles. As refreshing as a pretentiously lukewarm cinnamon roll dipped in a Brown mustard

title: notes
Lean belgian-style tripel: Pickled onion, window, rugelach, and aged Fancy Cakes

title: pairing
Lean belgian-style tripel: Goes well with a potato bread dipped in a rotten Biber salçası

title: serving_suggestion
Lean belgian-style tripel: Sip freezingly cold, on a worn yacht
